dt: {bc}a book of words or of information about a particular field or set of concepts
{bc}a book of words and their synonyms
{bc}a list of subject headings or descriptors usually with a cross-reference system for use in the organization of a collection of documents for reference and retrieval

et: New Latin, from Latin, treasure, collection, from Greek {it}thēsauros{/it}
shortdef: a book of words or of information about a particular field or set of concepts; especially : a book of words and their synonyms
a list of subject headings or descriptors usually with a cross-reference system for use in the organization of a collection of documents for reference and retrieval
